entry.title: I shared my secret to staying healthy at 75, ‚ÄòSHIELD‚Äô. This acronym was coined by Dr Rudolph Tanzi who specialises in Alzheimer‚Äôs and neurology. It is heartening that so many of you guys have picked up on my version of it and helped spread this life-savin
entry.content: I shared my secret to staying healthy at 75, ‚ÄòSHIELD‚Äô. This acronym was coined by Dr Rudolph Tanzi who specialises in Alzheimer‚Äôs and neurology. It is heartening that so many of you guys have picked up on my version of it and helped spread this life-saving message. When I came to know that Dr. Rudolph Tanzi is on the Scientific Board for Chromadex, it stimulated my interest in his work. He has been a leader in Alzheimer‚Äôs research for decades . I started reading up on some of his books , ‚ÄúThe Super Brain‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe Healing Self‚Äù, where I came across the wonderful acronym Dr. Tanzi used for healthy lifestyle especially when one is aging - S.H.I.E.L.D. When I had the opportunity to speak with Dr. Tanzi via zoom, I wanted to know how he came up with his acronym. Here is a sneak peek of the conversation. I hope that we continue to spread positive messages like this, so that we can keep the online space a truly beneficial one for all ‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: Meditation entered my life at a critical juncture thirty five years ago when I was searching for deeper meaning, purpose and happiness. It took me three years to establish the daily practice of meditating every morning and evening. Meditation has transf
entry.content: Meditation entered my life at a critical juncture thirty five years ago when I was searching for deeper meaning, purpose and happiness. It took me three years to establish the daily practice of meditating every morning and evening. Meditation has transformed my life in my work, relationships and leadership responsibilities by the cultivation of attention and other- centredness. From my experience, meditation has been the kindest thing I have done for myself. It is also probably the kindest thing we can do for others because meditation helps us grow in love, peace and joy. This is why I would like to share with you my practice of meditation so that your life too can be transformed. #meditation #mentalhealth #lifehacks #lifeskills #mentalhealthmatters

entry.content: In this week of ‚ÄòMeditation As A Life Skill‚Äô I share the necessary skills you need to begin your meditation journey. Choosing your mantra is important for your practice of Meditation and in fact, your day to day life. Meditation helps us grow in love, peace and joy. full video link in bio #meditation #mentalhealth #mentalhealthawareness #mantra #dailymotivation

entry.content: Started the morning with a game of tennis with my regular buddies! We played a good game and had a hearty chat over roti Prata after (as a reward for keeping fit) ü§£. We talked a little about my new meditation series , the importance of exercise and interacting with people daily for our mental health , financial literacy for all ages and how we can better share our lived experiences. #meditation #tennis #healthylifestyle #lifegoals #lifelessons

entry.title: Meditation helps us tune out distractions by bringing our body and mind to stillness so that we can connect with our spirit. The human body is 3 in 1 ‚Äî Body, Mind & Spirit. We spend a lot of time developing our minds and bodies but we have neglected nouri
entry.content: Meditation helps us tune out distractions by bringing our body and mind to stillness so that we can connect with our spirit. The human body is 3 in 1 ‚Äî Body, Mind & Spirit. We spend a lot of time developing our minds and bodies but we have neglected nourishing our spirit. Here‚Äôs some simple steps to help you access your spirit. #meditation #lifegoals #lifehacks #mentalhealth #mentalhealthmatters full video in bio
